game.name: Anarchy School
game.categories: 싱글 플레이어, 퀵타임 이벤트 없이 플레이 가능, 가족 공유
game.shortDescription: Anarchy School is a story-rich first-person action adventure set in a fictional upper school in Finland, of all places. Unravel the secrets of the school, and rise up against the malicious principal Nazier.
game.shortDescriptionEn: Anarchy School is a story-rich first-person action adventure set in a fictional upper school in Finland, of all places. Unravel the secrets of the school, and rise up against the malicious principal Nazier.
